Texts.LongWelcomeMessage: Welcome to the application. This is a startup project based on the ABP framework. For more information visit
Texts.Home:Carousel1Text: Trusted by over 4400+ individuals from YouTube and millions of learners around the world
Texts.Home:Carousel2Text: All the Skills You Need in One Place
Texts.Home:Carousel3Text: From critical skills to technical topics, SmartLearn by Karthik supports your professional development.
Texts.Home:PlanDescription: Don't want to buy courses one by one? Pick a plan to help you achieve your learning goals faster.
Texts.Home:FreePlanFeatures: Access to 8 courses, Community Support, Access on mobile and TV
Texts.Home:BasicPlanFeatures: Access to 10 courses, Community Support, Access on mobile and TV
Texts.Home:ProPlanFeatures: Access to all courses, Priority Support, Offline viewing, Exclusive Webinars
Texts.Home:PremiumPlanFeatures: All Pro Plan features, 1-on-1 Mentoring, Access to Premium Courses, Early Access to New Content
